zaps.title: GitHub Push → Activate AgentX5
zaps.description: Auto-activates 750 agents + 666 tasks on every GitHub push

setup.instructions:
1. Create new Zap
2. Add Webhook trigger
3. Copy webhook URL to GitHub repo Settings > Webhooks
4. Paste this URL in GitHub webhook URL field
5. Select 'Just the push event'
6. Save

zaps.title: 3-Hour System Check
zaps.description: Checks all systems every 3 hours (minimal data usage)

trigger.setup: Select 'Every 3 hours' to minimize data usage

import_instructions.method_1_bulk_import: Not available - Zapier requires manual Zap creation
method_2_manual_setup: 3. Follow the trigger/action config above for each Zap
method_3_zapier_cli: 3. Use this config as reference to build Zap

github_webhook_setup.step_3: Payload URL: [Your Zapier webhook URL from Zap #1]

github_secrets: ZAPIER_WEBHOOK_URL: Get from Zapier Zap #1 webhook trigger
